channel.title: Git on Kane
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Kane

item.title: Everything About Git
item.description: The Perfect Commit Add the rightchanges Include changes for only one topic, git add -p index.html Compose a goodcommit message, git commit Subject = concise summary of what happened Body = more detailed explanation What is now different then before? What’s the reason for the change? Is there anything to watch out for / anything particularly remarkable?
